summary: This document is a Credit Support Annex to the ISDA Master Agreement between Deutsche Bank AG and Southern Trust Company, Inc., detailing the terms and conditions regarding the management of collateral and securities accounts. It outlines the obligations of both parties, the handling of securities, and the rights of the secured party.

persons.name: Deutsche Bank AG
persons.context: Deutsche Bank AG is identified as the Secured Party in the agreement, holding a security interest in the collateral.

persons.name: Southern Trust Company, Inc.
persons.context: Southern Trust Company, Inc. is identified as the Debtor in the agreement, responsible for providing collateral to the Secured Party.

persons.name: Deutsche Bank Securities Inc.
persons.context: Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. acts as the Intermediary managing the securities account as per the agreement.

persons.name: Cynthia Cuomo
persons.context: Cynthia Cuomo is mentioned as a signatory for Deutsche Bank AG.

persons.name: Kathleen Yohe
persons.context: Kathleen Yohe is mentioned as a signatory for Deutsche Bank AG.

persons.name: Paul E. Salvas
persons.context: Paul E. Salvas is mentioned as a signatory for Deutsche Bank Securities Inc.

persons.name: Thomas Hoddinott
persons.context: Thomas Hoddinott is mentioned as a signatory for Deutsche Bank Securities Inc.

connections.description: Deutsche Bank AG holds a security interest in the collateral provided by Southern Trust Company, Inc.
Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. acts as the intermediary managing the securities account for Southern Trust Company, Inc.
Cynthia Cuomo is a director at Deutsche Bank AG, representing the organization in the agreement.
Kathleen Yohe is a director at Deutsche Bank AG, representing the organization in the agreement.
Paul E. Salvas is a vice president at Deutsche Bank Securities Inc., representing the organization in the agreement.
Thomas Hoddinott is a director at Deutsche Bank Securities Inc., representing the organization in the agreement.

events.title: Establishment of Securities Account
events.description: The agreement establishes a securities account for the management of collateral between the parties.

keyFacts: The document is a Credit Support Annex to the ISDA Master Agreement dated October 28, 2013.
Deutsche Bank AG is the Secured Party, while Southern Trust Company, Inc. is the Debtor.
Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. acts as the Intermediary managing the securities account.
The agreement outlines the rights and obligations of the parties regarding collateral management.
The securities account includes primary and secondary accounts for different purposes.
